attributes.action:
Stricter laws for people
Carrying knifes
attributes.additional_details: There are more and more youths being murderer and hurt by knife crime
attributes.background: Have harsher punishments for carrying knifes, threatening people with knifes

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Zero Tolerance on Knife Crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581806
